data.title: Editing work of Santhanam’s Biskoth begins
data.meta_description: Makers of Santhanam’s Biskoth shared a new update about the film on social media. Director R Kannan took to Twitter to announce that the post-production work for the film was under way.
data.text:
Chennai

Sharing a selfie along with the editor RK Selva, Kannan wrote, “Final trimming for Santhanam’s Biskoth with my editor RK Selva. By month-end, the final copy will be ready.” (sic)

The post-production work, which was put on hold due to the lockdown, resumed after the government allowed filmmakers to conduct some activities including editing, dubbing, sound mixing, VFX, among others works.

Written and directed by Kannan, Biskoth also stars Tara Alisha Berry, Motta Rajendran, Sowcar Janaki, Anandraj and Manohar. The star comedian has previously worked along with the director in Jayamkondaan,Kanden Kadhalai, Vanthaan Vendraan, and Settai. There are also reports circulating that Santhanam’s new comedy flick Server Sundaram is expected to be released on OTT platforms.
